00035 // for mavencore
00036 #define public_method           public: virtual 
00037 #define public_static_method    public: static 
00038 #define public_variable         public: 
00039 #define public_static_variable  public: static
00040 #define public_constructor      public: 
00041 #define private_method          private: virtual 
00042 #define private_static_method   private: static 
00043 #define private_variable        private: 
00044 #define private_static_variable private: static
00045 #define private_constructor     private: 
00046 
00047 // for catching potential memory problems
00048 #define catchMalloc(__variable, __objName) \
00049         if(__variable == 0) { \
00050                 printf("ERROR: malloc() failed for %s\n", __objName); \
00051         }
00052 #define catchNilObjectException(__variable, __action) \
00053         if(__variable == 0) { \
00054                 __action; \
00055         }
00056 #define newStatic(objectName, variableName) namespace objectName##$static { variableName; }
00057 #define externStatic(objectName, variableName) namespace objectName##$static { extern variableName; }
00058 #define getStatic(objectName, variableName) objectName##$static::variableName
00059

00062 #define extends : public
00063 #define readonly

00065 // random number generation for Math.random()
00066 #define N 624
00067 #define M 397
00068 #define MATRIX_A 0x9908b0dfUL   // constant vector a
00069 #define UPPER_MASK 0x80000000UL // most significant w-r bits
00070 #define LOWER_MASK 0x7fffffffUL // least significant r bits
00071 extern mlong mt[N];        // the array for the state vector
00072 extern mint mti;           // mti==N+1 means mt[N] is not initialized
